name: Indy 800
summary: Indy 800 is a racing game for up to 8 players. The massive cabinet takes up 16 square feet of floor space and has two wheels on each side. One of the first full color arcade games, each player gets a different colored car. Players race around a track that twists around at sharp angles. Players can make fast, sharp turns, which was unusual at the time.
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 别名: Indy 500 (在Atari 2600上的名称)
  • 平台: 街机
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 至多8人
  • 发行日期: 1975年4月
  • 其他发行日期: 1977年11月11日 (Atari 2600)
